name: Priyu
greetingText: Happy Birthday to the most special person in my life!
wishText: May your day be as magical and wonderful as you are!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, Priyu!! I hope you have the most amazing day! Blah! Blah!
text2: I was about to do this ,but , I wanted to make this day unforgettable.
text3: So, I decided to create something unique.
text4: I realized I wanted to give you something
text5Content: You are the most extraordinary person to me
outroText: I hope this little surprise brings a big smile to your face!
replayText: Click here if you want to see it all over again.
